name: Air Fryer Tilapia with Fresh Lemon Pepper
author: lutzflcat
summary: Although this fish is low carb and light, you won't be sacrificing flavor. Using fresh lemon pepper really kicks up the flavor of mild tilapia.
ingredients: 1 ½ teaspoons coarsely ground black peppercorns
1 sprig parsley, chopped, or more to taste
directions: Preheat the air fryer to 400 degrees F (200 degrees C) for 3 minutes
While fryer is preheating, rinse tilapia fillets and pat dry with a paper towel
Combine lemon zest, olive oil, pepper, salt, and garlic in a bowl
Rub spice mixture over the tilapia
Spray the air fryer basket with cooking spray and place the filets inside, coated side up
Air fry until fish can be flaked with a fork, 7 to 10 minutes
Do not crowd the fish filets; you may need to fry a second batch, depending on the size of your air fryer
Remove tilapia to a plate, garnish with chopped parsley, and serve with lemon wedges
